INGREDIENTS:

 • Sardine/Mathi-1 kg
 • Garlic-20 cloves (long strips) 
 • Ginger-2 big pieces (strips) 
 • Green chilly-15 (slits) 
 • Curry leaves-4 strings
 • Chilly powder-2 1/2 tbsp
 • Turmeric powder-1/2tsp
 • Asafoetida powder-less than 1/4tsp
 • Fenugreek powder-less than 1/4 tsp
 • Salt- to taste
 • Mustard seeds-1tsp
 • Fenugreek seeds-1/2tsp
 • Oil- for frying
 • Vinegar-1cup
 • Hot Water-2 to 3 cups
 • Dry red chilly-5 (slits) 

 FOR MARINATION: 
 • Chilly powder-2 1/2 tbsp
 • Turmeric powder-1/2tsp
 • Salt- to taste

 METHOD: 
 1. Choose very small sardines ..Small ones best for pickle than big sardines.. 
 2. Cut ,clean and wash them properly using salt and vinegar .. 
 3. Then make 5 to 6 gashes on each sides.. 
 4. Make a paste of chilly powder,turmeric powder and salt ..Marinate the sardines with this masala ..Keep aside for minimum 15 minutes. 
 5. Heat 3 tbsp oil in a heavy bottomed non stick pan. 
 6. Fry ginger pieces,garlic pieces ,green chilly separately,Keep aside. 
 7. Then splutter mustard seeds,fenu greek seeds,dry red chilly and curry leaves one by one(Add enough oil ). 
 8. Then switch off the gas and add all the powders and saute until the raw smell goes.. 
 9. Then add vinegar ,boiled water ,salt and roasted ginger-garlic and curry leaves ..Mix well ..Keep aside .. 
 10. Now fry the sardines in batches till they become crisp (dont burn ) 
 11. Check the salt and sourness ..So yummy but simple mathi achar is ready.
